Message.Title: LOL. It was a couple of weeks ago when pumpers were saying this would fly...
Message.Msg: Where are those pumpers now? After disappointing earnings, the stock went up to $313, when it really shouldn't have. Folks here and on CNBC were saying how it would hit $330 to $350 within days after. The stock hasn't been anywhere near that $313 pop since then, and only continues to slide. Chart technicals don't look too good either.

Message.Title: Most undervalued Nasdaq Share
Message.Msg: Key Takeaways from Q2’13 of Local Corp with idiotic low 38 million market-cap • Increase 2013 guidance: » Revenue between $95 million and $97 million » Adjusted EBITDA of at least $5.4 million • Sequential revenue growth up 6% to $22.7 million in Q2 from $21.5 million in Q1 • Adjusted EBITDA up 72% to $1.2M in Q2 from $685K in Q1 • Record Mobile traffic was 34 million MUVS for Q2 • Sold Spreebird daily deals business, expect $600K annualized improvement in earnings and cash flow • Continued expansion of our highest gross margin business – Network ex TAC up 118% from Q2 2012 • Completed a $5 million convertible note financing in April 2013

Topic.Title: Less and less buy from AMZN because more states start collecting tax

Topic.Title: etrade market orders did not fill for 6 minutes

Message.Msg: A long time ago, I heard rumors that their business model included matching their customers' buy/sell orders internally to make money on commissions. To lesser degree, many online brokers may be doing it. In any case, a 6-minute delay is of no significance on AMZN. It seems that AMZN is a fast moving stock, but if you look at her behavior carefully, she is a very slow moving stock.

The hope of AMZN coming crashing down is probably unrealistic. I agree with this scenario. Outside demand for this Scam is drying up. Bezos and the funds can continue to buy and sell to each other small amounts in dark pools, at pumped up prices to keep it propped up, but the math will not hold without outside buyers. So it will be a slow bleed. When the next attempt of AMZN to do something "spectacular" doesn't cause a response [I'm not talking about the constant paid shill music from the Motley Fools, etc.], then you will know the jig is up.

Message.Title: been reading posts but
Message.Msg: I have found nothing but BS that explains why almost every article is positive but this thing is just dumping anyone got real info on this and not just bashing or pumping

It is about the technical. After the disappointing earning, they couldn't sell so they pumped up and have been selling slowly. Just look at the chart. Straight down line. Big boys know what they are doing. What I am waiting for is the panic selling ahead of us. Don't get caught on it. Good luck to you.

Strong increase of organic traffic of Local Corp - now 46% of total traffic against 38% last year . During the three and six months ended June 30, 2013, approximately 54%, of our overall traffic were purchased from other search engine websites. During the three and six months ended June 30, 2012, approximately 62% and 63%, respectively, of our overall traffic were purchased from other search engine websites. Source: Last Q10
AMZN is a momentum stock. When she's not actively going up, there's absolutely no reason to go long on her.
